column1: activity_data
Merged "dailyActivity_merged" datasets with "3.12.2016-4.11.2016" and  "4.12.2016-5.12.2016"  dates
Shaded dailyActivity_merged datasets 3.12.16-4.11.16 in grey to idenitify duplicates
Bolded column titles
Filled column titles cells blue
Added filters to all columns

Rounded up numerical value decimal points to the hundredths place (0.00) for the following columns: TotalDistance, TrackerDistance, LoggedActivitiesDistance, VeryActiveDistance, ModeratelyActiveDistance, LightActiveDistance, and SedentaryActiveDistance
Idenitfied duplicates by ID and date, then deleted "4.12.16" datapoints from the "dailyActivity_merged 3.12.16-4.11.16" dataset - these fo not pertain to the dataset
Recolored dailyActivity_merged datasets 3.12.16-4.11.16 back to white
Added column, activity_weekday with function"=TEXT(B2, "dddd")"
Added column, activity_category with function "F(D:D <= 5000, "Sedentary", IF(D:D <=7499, "Light", IF(D:D <=10000, "Moderate", "Active")))" based on TotalSteps
Added column, total_active_mins with function "=SUM(VeryActiveMinutes, FairlyActiveMinutes, LightlyActiveMinutes)"
Added column, active_percentage with function "=DIVIDE(total_active_mins,1440)"
Added column, sedentary_percentage with function "=DIVIDE(SedentaryMinutes, 1440)"
Added column, total_workout_mins with function "=SUM(VeryActiveMinutes, FairlyActiveMinutes)
Change format values in active_percentage and sedentary_percentage to percentages
Set conditional formatting in total_workout_mins column for values < 60 mins
sleep_data
Bolded column titles
Removed dulpicate entries from dataset to enusure data accuracy
created a column for sleep efficiency to give a better understanding for the sleep data
formatted the sleep day column to display the date
weight_data
Mergerd weight data from 3.12-4.11 and 4.12-5.12.2016
Bolded column titles.
Filled column titles cells blue.
Rounded and displayed WeightKg, WeightPounds, and BMI to 2 decimal places using Format → Number → Number and the decimal place buttons.
Hid Column E (Fat) — not needed for this case study.
Row 33 and 31 have been removed because their dates don't belong in this dataset.
